name: Rampage Mutt
description:
A 2D Beat´em up!!

Playable on Mobile Devices & Desktop (+Gamepad)

What´s going on...

"Ruining that rigged fight, made your world crumble and pissed all gang bosses off. Lose, never was an option, so face off everyone looking for a fight. Don't waste your time, ... break out the city it wont be easy"...

KEYBOARD CONTROLS:

CHARACTER MOVES:

A:  LEFT - S:  DOWN - D:  RIGHT - W:  UP

J:  PUNCHS - K:  PUNCHS2 / DASHPUNCH + D or A

L: BLOQ / DASHROLL + D or A

SPACE: JUMP + J or K (KICK)

ARROWS TO MOVE ON THE MENUS.

ENTER KEY: OK.

P: PAUSE  -  M: MUTTE 

SUPR: EXIT TO TOP MENU
